about_the_game: Now almost completely drained, Jack manages to escape from the twins, but, once again, is grabbed by the creepy Danielle and Wummy. They blab on and on about some new healing therapy and want to try it on poor Mr. Hoff, dragging him upstairs for the third time.

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.
Content Warning:"Waifu fighter - F-ist & Flirtatious: Ch.3 Special Massage" contains non-consensual sex and blowjob.

detailed_description: Now almost completely drained, Jack manages to escape from the twins, but, once again, is grabbed by the creepy Danielle and Wummy. They blab on and on about some new healing therapy and want to try it on poor Mr. Hoff, dragging him upstairs for the third time.
name: Waifu fighter - F-ist & Flirtatious: Ch.3 Special Massage

package_groups.title: Buy Waifu fighter - F-ist & Flirtatious: Ch.3 Special Massage

short_description: The Tourney of Supreme Warriors has ended, and the six most powerful female warriors have been laid to waste by Jack Hoff's mighty trousers. Thus, they've conspired to ambush him, and exact their revenge. Will the goddess that smiles upon him be the goddess of victory... or fertility?
supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Thai
*languages with full audio support
